ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule ensures that KYC Checkbox and Sign-Off Dates are entered together.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId = '00e33000001BhFk', OR( AND( KYC__c = TRUE, ISBLANK(KYC_Sign_Off_Date__c)), AND ( KYC__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(KYC_Sign_Off_Date__c)))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check the KYC checkbox and enter the KYC Sign-Off Date to signify completion of KYC Process
